When it comes to ‚Äústaff engineering‚Äù, the old management saying of ‚Äúwhat got you here won‚Äôt get you there‚Äù applies.

content.html: Senior and Staff Engineers are different. Senior: - Focus on their team - Invest in individuals - Evaluated on personal growth Staff+: - Focus on the org or company - Invest in improving systems and processes - Evaluated on functional area growth Staff+ != Senior
content.value:
Senior and Staff Engineers are different.

Senior:

- Focus on their team
- Invest in individuals
- Evaluated on personal growth 

Staff+:

- Focus on the org or company
- Invest in improving systems and processes
- Evaluated on functional area growth

Staff+ != Senior
